  • Smart brevity
    August 3, 2023

    Smart brevity explains how being concise and getting to the point quickly is a valuable communication skill in the modern workplace and life. The book provides tips and strategies for writing and speaking clearly and concisely to convey your message effectively without unnecessary fluff.
